title: Sign In to Your BALL Account
subtitle: Access your account, profile, properties and rewards by signing in to your BALL account.

steps.title: Visit the Login Page
steps.description: Navigate to the Login Page by clicking the Sign In Link at the top of the Page.

note.text: If you are already signed in, you will see your name instead of the Sign In link.

steps.title: Enter Your Email and Password
steps.description: On the sign-in page, provide your registered email address and password in the respective fields. If you have forgotten your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link to reset it.

note.text: Click on the icon in the password field to show the password you are typing. This will help you confirm that you are typing the correct password.

steps.title: Sign In with Google
steps.description: Alternatively, you can sign in using your Google account by clicking the 'Sign in with Google' button. This will redirect you to Google for authentication and then back to BALL.

steps.title: Sign In to Demo Account
steps.description: If you have a demo account, click on the 'Have a Demo Account? Login Here' link to sign in with your demo credentials.

steps.title: Create a New Account
steps.description: If you don't have an account yet, click on the 'Not Registered? Create Account' link to sign up and start your journey to homeownership.
